name: Executioner's Charm
effect_name_jp: CP獲得 - 狂暴対象攻撃
effect_desc1: Generates 12 Chain Points when attacking a target that has Enraged
effect_desc1_jp: 狂暴化した対象を攻撃した場合、CPを12獲得する。
effect_desc1_kr: 광폭화 대상을 공격한 경우 CP 12 회복
effect_desc4: Recovers 50 Action Points when attacking an Enraged target
effect_desc4_jp: 狂暴化した対象を攻撃時、APを50獲得する。
effect_desc4_kr: 광폭화 대상 공격 시 AP 50 회복

name: Gladiator's Charm
effect_desc1: Generates 12 Chain Points when using an ultimate
effect_desc1_jp: 必殺スキル使用時、CPを12獲得する。
effect_desc4: Increases Dual Attack Weakness Gauge damage by 1
effect_desc4_jp: 連携攻撃のWGダメージが1UPする。

name: Rogue's Charm
effect_desc1: Generates 10 Chain Points when an attack scores a critical hit
effect_desc1_jp: 会心発生時、CPを10獲得する。
effect_desc4: Increases damage dealt against targets inflicted with Break
effect_desc4_jp: ブレイクした対象を攻撃時、ダメージがUPする。

name: Sage's Charm
effect_desc1: Generates 10 Chain Points when attacking with an advantageous element
effect_desc1_jp: 有利属性で敵を攻撃した場合、CPを10獲得する。
effect_desc1_kr: 공격 시 유리한 속성관계인 경우 CP 10 회복
effect_desc4: Increases Weakness Gauge damage of attacks that target all enemies by 1 (excluding Skill Chains)
effect_desc4_jp: 全体攻撃のWGダメージが1UPする。(チェーンスキルには適用されない)
effect_desc4_kr: 전체 공격 WG 피해량 1 증가 (체인 제외)

name: Prophet's Charm
effect_desc1: Has a 100% chance to generate 16 Chain Points when a battle starts
effect_desc1_jp: 戦闘開始時、100%の確率でCPを16獲得する。
effect_desc4: Increases Weakness Gauge damage of Single Attacks by 1 (excluding Dual Attacks)
effect_desc4_jp: 単体攻撃のWGダメージが1UPする。(連携攻撃には適用されない)
effect_desc4_kr: 단일 공격 WG 피해량 1 증가 (협공 제외)

name: Saint's Charm
effect_desc1: Generates 10 Chain Points when using a non-attack skill
effect_desc1_jp: 攻撃以外のスキル使用時、CPを10獲得する。
effect_desc1_kr: 공격이 아닌 스킬 사용 시 CP 10 회복
effect_desc4: Increases Skill Chain Weakness Gauge damage by 1
effect_desc4_jp: チェーンスキルのWGダメージが1UPする。

name: Tactician's Charm
effect_desc1: Recovers 20 Action Points when attacking with an advantageous element
effect_desc1_jp: 有利属性で敵を攻撃した場合、APを20獲得する。
effect_desc1_kr: 공격 시 유리한 속성관계인 경우 AP 20 회복
effect_desc4: Recovers 30 Action Points when attacking with an advantageous element
effect_desc4_jp: 攻撃時、有利属性の攻撃判定の場合、APを30獲得する。
effect_desc4_kr: 공격 시 우위 속성이면 AP 30 회복

name: Assassin's Charm
effect_desc1: Recovers 30 Action Points when using an ultimate
effect_desc1_jp: 必殺スキル使用時、APを30獲得する。
effect_desc4: Recovers 45 Action Points when using an ultimate
effect_desc4_jp: 必殺スキル使用時、APを45獲得する。

name: Mage's Charm
name_jp: 魔法使いのタリスマン
effect_desc1: Recovers 30 Action Points when attacking all enemies
effect_desc1_jp: 全体攻撃時、APを30獲得する。
effect_desc4: Recovers 39 Action Points when attacking all enemies
effect_desc4_jp: 全体攻撃時、APを39獲得する。

name: Vanguard's Charm
effect_name_jp: AP獲得 - 広域被ダメージ
effect_desc1: Recovers 50 Action Points when hit by an attack that targets all allies
effect_desc1_jp: 全体攻撃を受けた場合、APを50獲得する。
effect_desc1_kr: 전체 공격에 의한 피격 시 AP 50 회복
effect_desc4: Recovers 60 Action Points when hit by an attack that targets all allies
effect_desc4_jp: 全体攻撃でダメージを受けた場合、APを60獲得する。
effect_desc4_kr: 전체 공격 피격 시 AP 60 회복

name: Undertaker's Charm
effect_desc1: Recovers 30 Action Points when killing an enemy
effect_desc1_jp: 敵を倒した時、APを30獲得する。
effect_desc4: Recovers 45 Action Points when killing an enemy
effect_desc4_jp: 敵を倒した時、APを45獲得する。

name: Powerful Adventurer's Talisman
name_jp: 強力な冒険者のタリスマン
effect_desc1: Recovers 30 Action Points when using an ultimate
effect_desc1_jp: 必殺スキル使用時、APを30獲得する。

name: Sharp Adventurer's Talisman
name_jp: 鋭敏な冒険者のタリスマン
effect_desc1: Generates 10 Chain Points when an attack scores a critical hit
effect_desc1_jp: 会心発生時、CPを10獲得する。
